EmailTemplate.name: Reminder Email To Candidate
EmailTemplate.subject: Cloud Peritus: Gentle reminder to complete your pre-onboarding
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!EMS_EM_Onboarding_Request__c.EMS_EM_First_Name__c} {!EMS_EM_Onboarding_Request__c.EMS_EM_Last_Name__c},
Hope you're doing well!
This is a gentle reminder to complete your pre-onboarding formalities as soon as possible. This will give us the necessary time to verify your details and ensure a smooth onboarding. Please click here to access the pre-onboarding portal.
If you are unable to provide any of the documents or details please send an email to hr.hyderabad@cloudperitus.com with the reason.
Thanks for your cooperation!
Regards,
The Cloud Peritus Team
